Text: How do you take them if I may ask?

@Vanek679 I grab the stream and download it. The stream usually is an flv file, and so after downloading I have to convert it. In the long run, it's sort of confusing, but I actually get these for my little sister, as she loves these, then I just torrent them.

@GdeFt The framerate was really screwy. I did use FLVExtract to get the source files, but I the framerates (both of them) did not work properly. I had to mess around. I then used Yamb to recompile into an MP4.
And with a flow you take that you know a site where you can watch Nickelodeon online?
Awesome. Thank you for taking the time to convert and upload these. =)
